title: SCP-701 Poster (The Tragedy of the Hanged King)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
++ SCP-701: The Hanged King's Tragedy play poster

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Small content warning, there is like, a lot of nooses." hide="hide"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/8Kp2wnM.jpg]]
//"At 7 pm, Friday, 5th of May at the University of ███████████ Theatre Hall! Come and witness this never before seen spectacle! Entry fee 20 cents."//
[[/collapsible]]

Boy, this one took a good while to make. I cannot say I am fully satisfied with the results, but it definitely does not look bad. And again, making fancy fonts is fun. I haven't yet decided what poster I want to make next, maybe it won't be a poster at all, but something new will be in the works soon.

Bye for now!
author: pab07
